title: :frame_photo:   Viewing the album's pictures
description:
All registered pictures can be **viewed in <#${picChannelId}>** but you can request the bot to show them anywhere **using the `/cute-pic` command**.
​

fields.name: Asking for random pictures
fields.value:
To have the bot reply with a random picture from the album, simply use this command: ```
/cute-pic
```​

fields.name: Asking for a specific picture
fields.value:
To have the bot reply with a specific picture from the album, use this command and provide the file name of the picture: ```
/cute-pic pic:<picture_name>
```
Please note that if two pictures are registered with the same name, the bot will reply with the first one it finds.
